channel.title: How do i add tormented demons into my 317?
channel.description:
iff som1 could get me all the stuff i need and tell me where to put it thanks it would help a lot :)
btw its delta and 317.

item.title: How do i add tormented demons into my 317?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

well firstly, this would be client sided, you need to add the model, put it in class 5, add the model ingame, then put animations etc (i think you need a 525+ header for that, not sure though) then assign it the emotes, attacks, hp, max hits all through the server, using npchandler, npc.cfg and npcdrop.cfg

dont ask for people to get the stuff for you though, no one likes to spoonfeed, use the search button in models section and client hacking section.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add tormented demons into my 317?
